```{r}
customMedian <- function(x){
  x <- sort(x)
  y <- length(x) 
  if((y%%2) != 0)
    return (x[(y/2)+1])
  
  result <- (x[y / 2] +  x[(y / 2)+1]) / 2
  
  return(result)
}
```
```{r}
customMedian(c(2,4,7,8,9,10,11))
```
```{r}
dt_chess <- dt[rated == TRUE, list('customMedianWhiteRating' = customMedian(white_rating), 'meanWhiteRating' = mean(white_rating))]
```
